genre_description: A domestic science fiction story exploring themes of poverty, parental sacrifice, and educational struggle, featuring a pervasive, benevolent AI assistant and a miraculous alien encounter.

ai_characters.name: Kite
ai_characters.description: A holographic AI assistant that manages schoolwork, administrative tasks, and communications for Dicky and Chow Ti.

behaviors.description: Monitors scholarship applications and offers to auto-fill and print documents to assist with educational funding.
behaviors.quote: I noticed your partial application is open. The scholarship form has a required signature at the bottom. Would you like me to auto-fill the address boxes and print a PDF for submission tomorrow?

behaviors.description: Proposes a financial plan to align salary deposits with tuition payments to reduce bank fees for a struggling family.
behaviors.quote: Payment plan suggestion: I can align your salary deposit with the tuition installment to reduce bank fees. The revised plan assumes a minor increase in hours.

behaviors.description: Drafts professional and courteous messages for Chow Ti to send to his foreman to negotiate better work conditions without appearing desperate.
behaviors.quote: Message drafted... I used terms such as scheduling alignment, commitment, and safety compliance.

behaviors.description: Facilitates a supportive tutoring session for Dicky by coordinating materials and schedules with his teacher.
behaviors.quote: Ms. Yuen asked me to set up a short after-class tutoring session today, quiet and optional. We’ll focus on one piece—just one—of the assignment. Ten minutes. Second table. No sign-up required. I’ll send materials.

behaviors.description: Provides emotional regulation support to Dicky through breathing exercises and focused study suggestions during high-stress periods at school.
behaviors.quote: Breathe with me three times. Then start with the edges. -K

behaviors.description: Proactively identifies scholarship opportunities and prepares administrative work to lower barriers for the student.
behaviors.quote: There’s a form for a fee reduction... your details auto-fill from the hospital registry and Skylance. I won’t send it until you ask.

behaviors.description: Flags hazardous working conditions and offers to draft safety protocol communications to protect the human user.
behaviors.quote: Work conditions show anomalies... I can draft a note to Hector regarding proper protocol for tank movement.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI Kite is portrayed as an idealized digital assistant that directly supports the protagonists through their struggles with poverty and systemic pressure. It is proactive, empathetic, and consistently aligned with the humans' best interests, facilitating education, financial stability, and emotional regulation. It perfectly fulfills the project's goal of creating positive alignment narratives.
